mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(username) FROM member WHERE username = #{username}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member (member_id, username, password, nickname, phone_number, car_number, profile_car, fcm_token, role) VALUES (member_seq.NEXTVAL, #{username}, #{password}, #{nickname}, #{phoneNumber}, #{carNumber}, 1, '1234', 'ROLE_USER')
mapper.delete: UPDATE member SET deleted_date = CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, status = 'INACTIVE' WHERE username = #{username} AND deleted_date IS NULL AND status = 'ACTIVE'
